about_the_game:
The Hot Air Balloon Ticket gives you acces to all of the Hot Air Balloons located in the game world. You can use them to travel easily to other locations which will save you time and may prevent you to cross dangerous areas.

Note
· The DLC Bundle items are not tradeable or refundable.
· The Hot Air Balloon Ticket is an one-time purchase which gives lifetime acces to any Hot Air Balloon in the game.
